actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands on the Kootenai and Lolo National Forests in Montana as wilderness, to release other lands on those forests for multiple use management, and for other purposes.
short_title: Kootenai and Lolo National Forest Management Act of 1990

summary.text: Kootenai and Lolo National Forest Management Act of 1990 - Designates certain lands in the Kootenai and Lolo National Forests, Montana, as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System. States that Congress does not intend that the wilderness designation will lead to the creation of protective buffer zones around it. Expresses congressional findings regarding agreements on wilderness and timber supplies in the area. Requires that nondesignated lands be managed for multiple use, stating that those lands need not be managed for the purpose of protecting their suitability for wilderness designation prior to revision of the initial land and resource management plans. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Kootenai and Lolo National Forest Management Act of 1990
A bill to designate certain lands on the Kootenai and Lolo National Forests in Montana as wilderness, to release other lands on those forests for multiple use management, and for other purposes.
